Name.label: Classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency, salt wasting form
Classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency

TextSection.Contents: The salt wasting form of classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency (classical 21 OHD CAH; see this term) is characterized by virilization of the external genitalia in females, hypocortisolism, precocious pseudopuberty and renal salt loss due to aldosterone deficiency.
